Package edu.duke.ece651.hw2.simulation

Class SimulationParser

java.lang.Object
edu.duke.ece651.hw2.simulation.SimulationParser
public class SimulationParser extends Object
Parses JSON configuration files for the simulation.

  • Method Details

    • parseJsonFile

      public org.json.JSONObject parseJsonFile(String filePath) throws IOException, org.json.JSONException
      Reads and parses the JSON file from the given file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the JSON file.
      Returns:
      JSONObject representing the parsed JSON.
      Throws:
      IOException - if file reading fails.
      org.json.JSONException - if JSON parsing fails.

    • parseRecipes

      public Map<String,Recipe> parseRecipes(org.json.JSONObject json) throws SimulationException
      Parses the recipes from the given JSON object.

      Each recipe must contain:

      • output (String without the character ')
      • ingredients (JSONObject mapping ingredient names to amounts; each ingredient must be defined as a recipe)
      • latency (an integer between 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE)
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON object.
      Returns:
      map of recipe output names to Recipe objects.
      Throws:
      SimulationException - if required fields are missing or invalid.

    • parseTypes

      public Map<String,BuildingType> parseTypes(org.json.JSONObject json, Map<String,Recipe> recipes) throws SimulationException
      Parses building types from the given JSON object.

      Each type must contain:

      • name (String without the character ' and must be unique)
      • recipes (an array of recipe names already defined in recipes)
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON object.
      recipes - map of recipes for validation.
      Returns:
      map of building type names to BuildingType objects.
      Throws:
      SimulationException - if required fields are missing or invalid.

    • parseBuildings

      public Map<String,Building> parseBuildings(org.json.JSONObject json, Map<String,BuildingType> buildingTypes, Map<String,Recipe> recipes) throws SimulationException
      Parses buildings from the given JSON object.

      Each building must have a name (without the character ') and either:

      • For a factory: a 'type' field (must refer to a defined BuildingType) and a 'sources' array.
      • For a mine: a 'mine' field (must refer to a defined recipe) and a 'sources' array (can be omitted or empty).
      A building with both 'type' and 'mine' is an error.
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON object.
      buildingTypes - map of building types for validation.
      recipes - map of recipes for validation.
      Returns:
      map of building names to Building objects.
      Throws:
      SimulationException - if required fields are missing or invalid.

    • validateInput

      public void validateInput(Map<String,Building> buildings, Map<String,Recipe> recipes, Map<String,BuildingType> buildingTypes) throws SimulationException
      Validates the simulation input data.

      This includes:

      • Checking that ingredient keys in recipes exist as defined recipes.
      • Ensuring that each building's sources refer to defined buildings.
      • For factory buildings:
        • Each recipe (as per its BuildingType) must have at least one ingredient.
        • Every ingredient required must be provided by at least one source building. (A mine provides its single 'mine' output; a factory provides the outputs of its type.)
      Parameters:
      buildings - map of buildings.
      recipes - map of recipes.
      buildingTypes - map of building types.
      Throws:
      SimulationException - if validation fails.
